<script setup lang="ts">
import { ArrowDown, ArrowUp } from 'lucide-vue-next'

const open = defineModel<boolean>({
  default: false,
})
</script>

<template>
  <Button class="absolute top-1 right-1" size="icon-xs" @click="() => open = !open">
    <component :is="open ? ArrowUp : ArrowDown" class="text-primary-foreground cursor-pointer" />
  </Button>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { Check } from 'lucide-vue-next'

const { item, checked } = defineProps<{
  item: MultiSelectItemProp
  checked: boolean
}>()

const emit = defineEmits<{
  (e: 'select', value: string): void
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <CommandItem :key="item.value" :value="item.value" class="min-h-7" @select="emit('select', item.value)">
    <Check v-if="checked" class="text-primary-foreground" />
    <PartialsTypography variant="span" :text="item.text" :class="[checked ? 'ml-0' : 'ml-6']" />
  </CommandItem>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { X } from 'lucide-vue-next'

const { item, withRemove = true, onRemove } = defineProps<{
  item: MultiSelectItemProp
  withRemove?: boolean
  onRemove: (value: string) => void
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <Button class="flex items-center justify-between gap-2 rounded-full text-xs p-0 m-0 h-6" size="sm" @click="onRemove(item.value)">
    {{ item.text }}
    <X v-if="withRemove" class="text-primary-foreground cursor-pointer" />
  </Button>
</template>
